SELECT sum(zp.trace_point_to_number - zp.trace_point_from_number + 1) as count1, substring_index(g.category_full_name,'/', 1) as str_1 from zsl_trace_point zp LEFT JOIN zsl_trace z on z.trace_code_number = zp.trace_code_number LEFT JOIN goods g on g.goods_id = zp.trace_goods_id where zp.trace_parent_id is NULL
and z.trace_back2 = #{companyId}
and z.trace_back2 is null
GROUP BY str_1

select z.trace_id, z.trace_code_number, z.trace_company_name, z.trace_apply_type, z.trace_handle_status, z.trace_apply_date, z.trace_review_date, z.trace_enable_count, z.trace_refuse_remark, z.trace_apply_count, m.* from zsl_trace z left join merchant m on m.merchant_id = z.trace_business_id where m.merchant_status = 0 and z.trace_id = #{id}
